body:
I did not understand the last panel where she says "One must have that feature when a woman of our house is satisfied."
"wait why??"
"so then let me have once in  a while"
"chiii nee sama?!?"

The translation there was weird. What exactly did it mean?
My closest guess is that it's okay for Saito to fuck ppl "when he has such features"
and "So then, let me have HIM once in a while."

but I might be wrong.
I would fuck Cattleya so hard!
